org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.name: ConfigureOnVault
org.biouno.unochoice.DynamicReferencePar.description:
IF you are the first time to configure those values on Vault. Please fill in the correct values for each path.
This is the mini scope configuration on Vault for deploy Commerce

secureScript.script:
def process = ["python","/commerce-devops-utilities/utilities/vault/vault_keyvalue.py","fetchkv","-tenant",Tenant,"-env",EnvName,"-vault_url",vault_url,"-vault_token",vault_token].execute() result=process.in.text if(result == "None\n"){ result = """ domainName=default.svc.cluster.local auth/dbHost= auth/dbName= auth/dbPassword= auth/dbPort= auth/dbUser= auth/dbType=db2 auth/merchantKeyEncrypte= auth/spiUserName= auth/spiUserPwd= live/dbHost= live/dbName= live/dbPassword= live/dbPort= live/dbUser= live/dbType=db2 live/merchantKeyEncrypte= live/spiUserName= live/spiUserPwd= """ } html= """

"""
